description: This file defines a React functional component named Modal, which displays a modal dialog with optional title, footer, and children content. It manages modal visibility based on the 'open' prop and includes accessibility features.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, onClose, children, footer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog with accessibility features, title, children, and an optional footer. Visibility is controlled by the 'open' prop.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ open, title, onClose, children, footer }) {$/
